name: HeartTransplantComplications
title: Heart Transplant Complications
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts related to complications associated with heart transplants.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent diagnoses related to heart transplant complications.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
